content: description the bonfire beach hoodie is perfect to throw on during a warm summer day it uses half_double_crochet throughout for an easy make the slightly oversized boxy fit makes it extra comfy to wear all day this pattern is available free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit on lionbrand com 2 it comes with all the yarn needed + the pdf digital download you can even customize your yarn color this pattern is a full video tutorial on my youtube channel 3 it s split into 4 videos for easy viewing follow along if you need some extra help 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-bonfire-beach-hoodie/ 2 https //shrsl com/2uy5y 3 https //youtu be/w04yvdrjw8q
